item.title: Markdown
item.author: info@taskit.de (Taskit)
item.description: Markdown I am a paragraph in markdown with line wrapping so fit in this width. I am a continuation of the first paragraph as there is no empty line before me. I am in the second paragraph. I am the third one. Even though there are two line breaks before me, this does not create any newline characters. After me there are two spaces before the newline character. I have a line break before me.

item.title: Eclectic Theme
item.author: info@taskit.de (Taskit)
item.description: Key Features Eclectic Theme A theme for high performance customizable hugo websites. NOTE: REQUIRES ATTRIBUTION IN FOOTER TO STAY INTACT FOR USAGE. See atishay.me for sample website. Key Features: Fast Millions of color themes with CSS Variables Color switcher to allow users to customize the color theme. Dark mode support. Structured metadata support for adding advanced content to any page (not just home page). Configurable footer. Search support (no external dependencies).

item.title: Impressum
item.author: info@taskit.de (Taskit)
item.description: This website uses resources from a variety of places. Here is to all of them: Built using Hugo Styled using Tailwind CSS Using Treact UI Kit from Owais Khan Background based on am image designed by BiZkettE1 / Freepik Early code using Eclectic and Universal About Us - Font Cheveux d’ange on drawing from PxHere. The text for the news image using font Chomsky Regular by copypaste on 1001fonts. Cover Images: Manufaturing I - Image by gefrorene_wand from Pixabay Manufacturing II - Image by Michael Schwarzenberger from Pixabay Manufacturing III - Image by gefrorene_wand from Pixabay Manufacturig IV - Image by Robert Wilkos from Pixabay Squares - Image by Pexels from Pixabay Triangles - Image by Alexandr Nebesyuk from Pixabay Circle - Image by PublicDomainPictures from Pixabay Curve - Image by Free-Photos from Pixabay News- Shaper - Image by tookapic from Pixabay Square License - Image by ds_30 from Pixabay Shape Blog (French) - Image by PIRO4D from Pixabay Home Page About Image: Photo by Angela Pencheva on Unsplash Contact Image: Photo by Cristofer Jeschke on Unsplash Blog icon: Pen by Icon Lauk from the Noun Project News icon: News Camera by Ben Davis from the Noun Project About icon: Info by i cons from the Noun Project Contact icon: Phone by Aulia from the Noun Project Facebook icon: from iconmonstr RSS icon: from iconmonstr Twitter icon: from iconmonstr Email icon: from icomonstr Hero image (Instruction Manual) from Undraw Plain text icon: Chrome Reader Mode by Justin Blake from the Noun Project Blog Page: Tags icon: Tag by Factoricons from the Noun Project Editor icon: App by Tienan from the Noun Project Contact Us: Map from OpenGeoFiction Store Add to Cart: https://uxwing.
